short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dynamic background with transparency and animations for Spotify

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Is a skin that changes background to the song/album cover that's playing also adds many effects and transitions

WARNING: This is an extension for the web app (open.spotify.com), not the Spotify app

v2.1
Fixed: 
Horizontal scroll bug


v2 : Complete overhaul
Added options to:
- Option to Disable animations for low end pc's
- Make the Side Bar Dark
- Disable the Transparent Lyrics
- Go back to the Old layout with Home button at the side (refresh if buggy)
Fixed:
- Buggy home categories
- Transform the new layout to be like the old one
